title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB:
Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only)

When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved. However, they do not have any effect on the image. For example, when opening a small image such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not provide any functionality.
SR:
Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only)

To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved.
3. Notice that the scrollbars do not have any effect on the image.
4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading as they do not provide any functionality.
